properties.description: 'This alert creates an incident when Image classification model evasion vulnerability detected from the AIShield.'
properties.query:
AIShield
| where Message has 'Image Classification AI Model Evasion Attack Identified'
| where Severity =~ 'High'
| extend NTDomain = tostring(split(Computer, '\\')[0]), HostName = tostring(split(Computer, '.')[0])

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: This query detects Image classification model evasion vulnerability alert from AIShield generated at {{TimeGenerated}}\n\nPlease check the source for more information and investigate further.
alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: AIShield - Image classification model evasion vulnerability detected.

properties.name: AIShield - Image classification model evasion vulnerability detection
